DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text describing the main points of a coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.  Abstract from a publication is acceptable.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing._A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena.

Concepts.definition: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

Property.preferredDefinition: A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/19/18 jk Released per PI/Maureen at Oct 2018 Steering Comm meeting.   3/7/18 jk created for MCL Genomics.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Description; a statement that represents something in words.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
